info.name: School/Coaching Management Collection
info.description: API collection for Subscription Management System

formdata.value: The academic calendar for 2025 has been finalized.
All institutes are requested to follow the new academic calendar starting from April 2025. Key dates include admission period, examination schedules, and holiday lists.
Updated fee structure for selected institutes.
The fee structure has been revised for the institutes in metro cities.

formdata.description: Optional - replaces old file if uploaded

formdata.value: Solve all problems from Chapter 5 - Algebra
Show all steps. Neat handwriting required.
I have completed all the problems. Please find my solutions attached.

request.description: Create a new institute document with file upload. Status will be 'pending' by default.
Get all institute documents. Returns documents with populated institute and verified_by (admin) information.

query.description: Filter by verification status: pending, approved, rejected (optional)

request.description: Get documents with optional filters. All filters are optional and can be combined.
Get a single document by its ID with populated institute and admin information.
Get all documents for a specific institute.
Update document metadata without changing the file. Can update document_type only.

formdata.description: New document file (optional) - old file will be deleted

request.description: Update document with a new file. The old file will be automatically deleted from the server.

Approve a document. Requires:
- verification_status: 'approved'
- verified_by: MongoDB ObjectId of the Super Admin who is verifying

Reject a document. Requires:
- verification_status: 'rejected'
- verified_by: MongoDB ObjectId of the Super Admin
- rejection_reason: Reason for rejection (required when rejecting)
Delete a document. The associated file will also be deleted from the server.
Create new Aadhaar document. Document number must be exactly 12 digits. The number will be encrypted and only masked version (XXXX-XXXX-1234) will be visible.
Create new PAN document. Format must be: ABCDE1234F (5 uppercase letters, 4 digits, 1 uppercase letter). The number will be encrypted and only masked version (XXXXX1234F) will be visible.
Get all identity documents with populated institute and admin (verified_by) information. Document numbers are encrypted and not included in response.

query.description: Filter by document type: aadhaar or pan (optional)
Filter by status: pending, approved, rejected (optional)

request.description: Get identity documents with optional filters. All filters can be combined.
Get identity document by ID. Returns only masked number (XXXX-XXXX-1234) for security.

item.name: Get Identity Document by ID (Decrypted - Admin Only)

query.description: Set to true to get decrypted document number (use only when necessary)

request.description: Get identity document with full decrypted number. Use this only when absolutely necessary for verification purposes.

item.name: Get Identity Documents by Institute ID

request.description: Get all identity documents (Aadhaar and PAN) for a specific institute.
Update document number. The new number will be automatically encrypted and a new masked version will be generated.

Approve an identity document. Requires:
- verification_status: 'approved'
- verified_by: MongoDB ObjectId of the Super Admin who is verifying

The response will include the admin's name and email.

Reject an identity document. Requires:
- verification_status: 'rejected'
- verified_by: MongoDB ObjectId of the Super Admin
- rejection_reason: Detailed reason for rejection (required)

The response will include the admin's name and email.
Delete an identity document permanently.

request.description: Create teacher authentication with auto-generated temporary password. Teacher must exist in teachers collection first.
Retrieve all teacher authentication records with populated teacher details
Get a specific teacher auth record by its ID

item.name: Get Teacher Auth By Teacher ID

request.description: Get teacher auth record by teacher_id reference
Update teacher auth details (email, mobile, status)
Permanently delete a teacher authentication record
Authenticate teacher and receive JWT token. Returns is_first_login flag.
Request 6-digit OTP for password reset (valid for 10 minutes)
Verify the 6-digit OTP sent to email
Change password when teacher knows their old password. Sets is_first_login to false.
Reset password using OTP (forgot password flow). Clears OTP and sets is_first_login to false.

request.description: Create student authentication with auto-generated temporary password. Student must exist in students_master collection and must have a primary contact email. Username is automatically set from student_code.
Retrieve all student authentication records with populated student details
Get a specific student auth record by its ID

item.name: Get Student Auth By Student ID

request.description: Get student auth record by student_id reference
Get student auth record by username (student_code)
Update student auth details (status)
Permanently delete a student authentication record
Authenticate student using username (student_code) and password. Returns JWT token and is_first_login flag.
Request 6-digit OTP for password reset using username (student_code). OTP is sent to primary contact email and valid for 10 minutes.
Verify the 6-digit OTP sent to registered primary contact email
Change password when student knows their old password. Sets is_first_login to false. Uses username (student_code) for identification.
Reset password using OTP (forgot password flow). Uses username (student_code) for identification. Clears OTP and sets is_first_login to false.
